subject: AccuWeather.com Alert(tm) Advisory  (avcavc)
body:
AccuWeather.com Alert[TM]






















 







							Severe Watches and Warnings for BEVERLY HILLS 













LOXCFWLOX
WHUS46 KLOX 101614
CFWLOX

COASTAL HAZARD MESSAGE
NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE LOS ANGELES/OXNARD CA
914 AM PDT TUE APR 10 2007

..HIGH SURF TO AFFECT WEST FACING BEACHES OF SOUTHWESTERN
CALIFORNIA...

STRONG NORTHWEST FLOW WILL BRING A RISE IN SEA CONDITIONS OVER
THE COASTAL WATERS THROUGH TONIGHT. AS A RESULT...HIGHER THAN
NORMAL SURF IS EXPECTED ACROSS WEST FACING BEACHES THROUGH
TONIGHT.

CAZ034-035-102215-
/O.CON.KLOX.SU.Y.0005.070410T1700Z-070411T1000Z/
SAN LUIS OBISPO COUNTY CENTRAL COAST-
SANTA BARBARA COUNTY CENTRAL COAST-
914 AM PDT TUE APR 10 2007

..HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PDT WEDNESDAY...

A HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PDT WEDNESDAY.

SEVEN TO NINE FOOT BREAKERS...WITH MAXIMUM SETS TO TEN FEET CAN
BE EXPECTED THROUGH TONIGHT ON EXPOSED WEST FACING BEACHES. WITH
THIS SWELL...A HIGH POTENTIAL FOR DANGEROUS RIP CURRENTS WILL
EXIST.

A HIGH SURF ADVISORY MEANS THAT HIGH SURF WILL AFFECT BEACHES IN THE
ADVISORY AREA...PRODUCING RIP CURRENTS AND LOCALIZED BEACH EROSION.
SWIMMING OR SURFING IN THESE WAVES MAY BE DANGEROUS FOR ANYONE. WHEN
IN DOUBT...JUST STAY OUT.

$$

CAZ039>041-102215-
/O.CON.KLOX.CF.S.0003.070410T1700Z-070411T1000Z/
SANTA BARBARA COUNTY SOUTH COAST-VENTURA COUNTY COAST-
LOS ANGELES COUNTY COAST INCLUDING DOWNTOWN LOS ANGELES-
914 AM PDT TUE APR 10 2007

..HIGHER THAN NORMAL SURF EXPECTED...

FOUR TO SIX FOOT BREAKERS CAN BE EXPECTED ALONG FAVORABLY EXPOSED
SOUTHWEST FACING BEACHES THROUGH TONIGHT...AS A MODERATE WEST SWELL
AND A MODERATE SOUTH SWELL IMPACT THE AREA. THE NATURE OF THIS
SWELL WILL ALSO BRING A HIGH POTENTIAL FOR DANGEROUS RIP CURRENTS.

BOTH THE WEST AND SOUTH SWELLS ARE EXPECTED TO BUILD EVEN MORE OVER
THE COASTAL WATERS WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY...AND A HIGH
SURF ADVISORY MAY BE NECESSARY FOR THE AREA LATER THIS WEEK.

ALL PERSONS SHOULD BE AWARE OF THE RISKS ASSOCIATED WITH WATER
RELATED ACTIVITIES AND USE EXTREME CAUTION WHEN ENTERING THE OCEAN.
STRONG RIP CURRENTS WILL ALSO MAKE SWIMMING OR SURFING IN THESE
LARGE WAVES VERY DANGEROUS FOR ANYONE. WHEN IN DOUBT...JUST STAY
OUT.

$$

KITTELL
